title: The Cook Undergraduate Research Journal Volume 1 Spring 2024
creator: Claryssa Baker; Thomas Garcia Jr.; Flick Kemp; Sydney Sterling
description: The first volume of CURJ, a scholarly platform dedicated to the dispersion of cutting-edge research and innovative perspectives within the field of political science. Contains the articles: Religiosity, Income, and Political Violence; Restricted Driver's Licenses and their Effects on Deportations; American Antitrust Policies: A Retrospective Analysis; The Effect of Body-Worn Cameras on State Conviction Rates.
publisher: Department of Politics and Philosophy, University of Idaho
source: Department of Politics and Philosophy, University of Idaho
